p: The effects of A. cepa on the levels of oxidants and antioxidant markers in the BALF of ovalbumin-sensitised Wistar rats, were evaluated. Treatment with A. cepa juice (0.175, 0.35, or 0.7 mg/mL) significantly reduced oxidant markers such as nitrogen dioxide (NO 2), nitrate (NO 3 –), and MDA but increased the levels of SOD and CAT in sensitised Wistar rats (Marefati et al. 2018).
